headline.main: Volkswagen Emissions Issue Affects 1.8 Million Light Commercial Vehicles: Paper
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Emissions Issue Affects 1.8 Million Light Commercial Vehicles: Paper

docs.snippet: Volkswagen's light commercial vehicles account for 1.8 million of the 11 million diesel cars fitted with software linked to a scandal over rigged emissions tests, a spokesman for VW's commercial vehicles business told a German newspaper....
docs.lead_paragraph: Volkswagen's light commercial vehicles account for 1.8 million of the 11 million diesel cars fitted with software linked to a scandal over rigged emissions tests, a spokesman for VW's commercial vehicles business told a German newspaper.

headline.main: Democrats Take Aim at Drug Prices, Prompting Sharp Drops in Biotech Stocks
headline.print_headline: Democrats Take Aim at Drug Prices, Prompting Sharp Drops in Biotech Stocks

docs.snippet: Democratic lawmakers on Monday attacked "massive" price increases of two heart drugs by Canada's Valeant, fueling a rout in drugmaker shares on worries of a government and insurer clampdown on U.S. drug prices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Democratic lawmakers on Monday attacked "massive" price increases of two heart drugs by Canada's Valeant, fueling a rout in drugmaker shares on worries of a government and insurer clampdown on U.S. drug prices.

headline.main: Obama says he's ready to work with Iran, Russia to end Syria war
headline.sub: Obama says he's ready to work with Iran, Russia to end Syria war

headline.main: Republican Megadonor Urges Talk on Climate Change Solutions
headline.print_headline: Republican Megadonor Urges Talk on Climate Change Solutions

docs.snippet: Republican businessman Jay Faison says his party should stop fighting science and start talking solutions to climate change. He has $175 million to invest in politics and policy to help inspire them. And if that's not enough, he's commissioned a s...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican businessman Jay Faison says his party should stop fighting science and start talking solutions to climate change. He has $175 million to invest in politics and policy to help inspire them. And if that's not enough, he's commissioned a survey, released Monday, that he says shows voters agree.

headline.main: Nats Suspend Closer Papelbon 4 Games for Fight With Harper
headline.print_headline: Nats Suspend Closer Papelbon 4 Games for Fight With Harper

docs.snippet: Bryce Harper is not quite sure what he could have done differently to avoid the dugout fight with teammate Jonathan Papelbon that resulted in the Washington Nationals suspending the closer for four games without pay....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bryce Harper is not quite sure what he could have done differently to avoid the dugout fight with teammate Jonathan Papelbon that resulted in the Washington Nationals suspending the closer for four games without pay.

headline.main: Maxwell Anderson Resigns as Director of Dallas Museum of Art
headline.print_headline: Director of Dallas Museum of Art Steps Down

docs.snippet: After four years at the helm of the Dallas Museum of Art, Maxwell L. Anderson moves on to a new position in New York....
docs.abstract: After four years at the helm of the Dallas Museum of Art, Maxwell L. Anderson moves on to a new position in New York.

headline.main: Future of Golf in Good Hands With New 'Big Three' on Top
headline.print_headline: Future of Golf in Good Hands With New 'Big Three' on Top

docs.snippet: Jordan Spieth's twin win in the Tour Championship and FedExCup playoffs aptly ended a magnificent PGA Tour season for himself and the sport of golf which has enthusiastically embraced a new 'Big Three.'...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth's twin win in the Tour Championship and FedExCup playoffs aptly ended a magnificent PGA Tour season for himself and the sport of golf which has enthusiastically embraced a new 'Big Three.'

headline.main: McCarthy Calls for Beefed-Up US Response Against IS, Russia
headline.print_headline: McCarthy Calls for Beefed-Up US Response Against IS, Russia

docs.snippet: House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy, the front-runner to replace House Speaker John Boehner, denounced President Barack Obama's foreign policy on Monday, saying the U.S. has "lost the respect of allies and adversaries alike."...
docs.lead_paragraph: House Majority Leader Kevin McCarthy, the front-runner to replace House Speaker John Boehner, denounced President Barack Obama's foreign policy on Monday, saying the U.S. has "lost the respect of allies and adversaries alike."
